ratings.comment: Dr. Rutledge is literally the best professor EVER. She makes the content so easy, understandable, and interesting. There are dozens of opportunities to pull up your grade (participation points, reflections, extra credit, etc). Go to class and pay attention and youll barely need to study, you get a flashcard for the exam anyways. 10/10 recommend

Dr. Rutledge is such a caring and understanding professor. She even takes the effort to learn your name and get to know you. Her lectures are interesting and engaging, and the course's assessments are manageable and more than fair. I can't begin to express how much I would recommend her. Take the class if you have the chance!

Really awesome professor! She is passionate about the material and really down to earth. She also incorporates a lot of interesting and relevant examples that make lectures fun to go to. Exams are fair and so is the grading on reflections. HIGHLY recommend taking this class with Julia!
Julia is a dime, 10/10 human being, sweet and caring. Teaches well and cares about her students success.
Really great professor! She really cares about what she's teaching and about the students.

Dr. Rutledge is an amazing professor who is passionate about the subject she teaches and about her students. She makes her tests as straightforward as possible and listens and responds to student feedback. She makes lectures fun and pumps you up before every test. Would definitely recommend!!!!

I am currently a junior and Julia is the best prof I have had at UW. She is so so sweet and you can tell she loves to teach. Lectures are interesting and easy to pay attention to. The class is perfectly structured and Julia really sets you up for success. She is a mom and uses great examples from her life in lectures. LOVE her!!!!
Super hot and really nice- class is a breeze if you show up and have any introductory psychology knowledge
Literally the best professor I have ever had ever. She teaches well and cares about her students. Plus she dresses cute and is super nice.
